alert.note: Alert for Claiborne; Issaquena; Warren; Yazoo (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued February 17 at 12:19PM CST until February 17 at 1:00PM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Tensas Parish in northeastern Louisiana... Eastern Madison Parish in northeastern Louisiana... Warren County in west central Mississippi... Northern Claiborne County in southwestern Mississippi... Southwestern Yazoo County in central Mississippi... Southeastern Issaquena County in west central Mississippi... * Until 100 PM CST. * At 1219 PM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Valley Park to near St. Joseph, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Valley Park around 1225 PM CST. Yokena around 1250 PM CST. Vicksburg and Le Tourneau around 1255 PM CST. Other locations impacted by these severe thunderstorms include Mound and Delta. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 600 PM CST for northeastern Louisiana...and central, southwestern and west central Mississippi. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
